verses.roman:
śāntera guṇa dāsye āche, adhika--'sevana'
ataeva dāsya-rasera ei 'dui' guṇa

synonyms: śāntera—of the platform of śānta-rasa; guṇa—the qualities; dāsye—on the platform of servitude; āche—are; adhika—additional; sevana—serving; ataeva—therefore; dāsya-rasera—of the platform of dāsya-rasa; ei dui guṇa—these two qualities (namely śānta and dāsya).
translation: "The qualities of śānta-rasa are also present in dāsya-rasa, but service is added. Thus the dāsya-rasa platform contains the qualities of both śānta-rasa and dāsya-rasa.
